fullText:
Daunting Challenge

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
Benefit: Creatures marked by you take a –3 penalty to attack rolls for any attack that doesn’t include you as a target (rather than a –2 penalty).

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 141.
name: Daunting Challenge
prerequisite: 11th level, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
benefit: Creatures marked by you take a –3 penalty to attack rolls for any attack that doesn’t include you as a target (rather than a –2 penalty).
